translation: When the priceless jewel of the profound perfection of wisdom is full of difficulties, and there are people who write, memorize, recite, cultivate, contemplate, and teach it for others, Māra wants to make it difficult for them not to write or even explain it."

translation: Although this evil demon wants to make it difficult for him not to write, retain, recite, cultivate, contemplate, or expound the profound prajñāpāramitā for others, he has no power to make it difficult for the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, to write and retain prajñāpāramitā."

translation: It was then that Śāriputra said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

translation: Who is it that has the power to make it impossible for that evil demon to keep the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas from writing, retaining, reciting, cultivating, contemplating, and expounding the profound prajñāpāramitā?"

source_sentence: 是佛神力令彼惡魔不能留難諸菩薩摩訶薩書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說甚深般若波羅蜜多。
translation: Because of the Buddha's miraculous power, that evil demon can't keep the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and bodhisattvas from writing, retaining, reciting, cultivating, contemplating, and explaining the profound prajñāpāramitā.

source_sentence: 又，舍利子！
translation: Again, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 亦是十方一切世界諸佛神力，令彼惡魔不能留難諸菩薩摩訶薩書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說甚深般若波羅蜜多。
translation: It's also the power of the buddhas of all the worlds in the ten directions that makes it impossible for those evil demons to keep the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and bodhisattvas from writing, retaining, reciting, cultivating, contemplating, and explaining the profound prajñāpāramitā in detail.

source_sentence: 又，舍利子！
translation: Again, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 諸佛世尊皆共護念修行般若波羅蜜多諸菩薩故，令彼惡魔不能留難一切菩薩摩訶薩眾令不書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣為他說甚深般若波羅蜜多。
translation: Because the buddhas and world-honored ones all share the same concern for the bodhisattvas who practice the perfection of wisdom, that evil demon can't keep all the bodhisattvas and mahāsattvas from writing, memorizing, reciting, cultivating, contemplating, and extensively teaching the profound perfection of wisdom for others.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 諸佛世尊皆共護念修行般若波羅蜜多諸菩薩眾所作善業，令彼惡魔不能留難。
translation: The buddhas and world-honored ones all work together to guard the good actions of the bodhisattvas who practice prajñāpāramitā, so that evil demons can't make things difficult for them.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩能於如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說，法爾應為十方世界無量無數無邊如來、應、正等覺現說法者之所護念，若蒙諸佛所護念者，法爾惡魔不能留難。
translation: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva can write, memorize, recite, practice, contemplate, and expound such a profound prajñāpāramitā, then he or she will be guarded by countless, numerous, and limitless tathāgatas, arhats, and virtually perfect enlightened ones in the ten directions who are presently teaching the Dharma, and if they are guarded by the buddhas, then the Dharma and evil demons won't be able to get in the way.

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: Vairocana!

source_sentence: 若善男子、善女人等能於如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說，應作是念：『我今書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣為他說甚深般若波羅蜜多，皆是十方無量無數無邊如來、應、正等覺現說法者神力護念。』」
translation: If good men and good women can write, memorize, recite, cultivate, contemplate, and expound such a profound prajñāpāramitā, they should think, 'Now, I've written, memorized, recited, cultivated, contemplated, and expounded the profound prajñpāramitā for others, and they are all supported by the spiritual power of the Tathāgata, the Worthy One, and the Completely Enlightened One who currently explains the teaching in the ten directions.'"

source_sentence: 若善男子、善女人等能於如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說，一切皆是十方世界諸佛如來神力護念，令彼所作殊勝善業一切惡魔不能留難。」
translation: If good sons and good women can write, memorize, recite, practice, contemplate, and expound these profound prajñāpāramitās, they will all be guarded by the spiritual power of the Tathāgatas of the world in the ten directions, so that the excellent good actions they perform won't be obstructed by harmful demons."

source_sentence: 佛言：「舍利子！
translation: The Buddha said, "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 如是！
translation: So it is!

source_sentence: 如是！
translation: So it is!

translation: Just as you said.

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: Śāriputra!

translation: If good men and good women can write, memorize, recite, cultivate, contemplate, and expound these profound prajñāpāramitās, they should know that they are all guarded by the spiritual power of the Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Fully Awakened Ones."

source_sentence: 時，舍利子復白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Śāriputra then again said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若善男子、善女人等能於如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說，十方世界無量無數無邊如來、應、正等覺現說法者，皆共識知是善男子、善女人等書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說甚深般若波羅蜜多，由此因緣歡喜護念。
translation: If good men and good women can write, retain, recite, cultivate, contemplate, and expound such a profound prajñāpāramitā, they all will understand that these are good men and good women who write, retain, recite, cultivate, contemplate, and expound the profound prajñpāramitā, and who because of this cause rejoice and protect it.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若善男子、善女人等能於如是甚深般若波羅蜜多，書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說，是善男子、善女人等，恒為十方無量無數無邊世界一切如來、應、正等覺現說法者佛眼觀見，由此因緣慈悲護念。」
translation: If good men and good women can write, memorize, recite, practice, contemplate, and expound the profound prajñāpāramitā like this, these good men and good women will always be able to observe it with the Buddha's eye for all tathāgatas, arhats, and virtually all perfect enlightened ones in the world in the ten directions who presently expound the Dharma, and they will compassionately guard it because of this cause and condition."

source_sentence: 佛言：「舍利子！
translation: The Buddha said, "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 如是！
translation: So it is!

source_sentence: 如是！
translation: So it is!

translation: Just as you said.

translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若善男子、善女人等書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說甚深般若波羅蜜多，是善男子、善女人等恒為十方無量無數無邊世界一切如來、應、正等覺現說法者佛眼觀見識知護念，令諸惡魔不能嬈惱，所修善業速得成辦。
translation: If good men and good women write, memorize, recite, practice, contemplate, and expound the profound prajñāpāramitā, these good men and good women will always be the eyes, views, consciousnesses, and mindfulness of all the tathāgatas, arhats, and true and perfect enlightened ones in the world in the ten directions who are currently teaching the Dharma, so that evil demons won't be able to disturb them and the good actions they cultivate will be accomplished quickly.

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: Vairocana!

source_sentence: 住菩薩乘諸善男子、善女人等若能於此甚深般若波羅蜜多，書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說，當知是善男子、善女人等已近無上正等菩提，諸惡魔怨不能留難。」
translation: If good men and good women who reside in the bodhisattva vehicle can write, memorize, recite, practice, contemplate, and expound this profound perfection of wisdom, they should know that they are good men and good women who have approached unsurpassed perfect enlightenment and cannot be hindered by harmful demons."

source_sentence: 「復次，舍利子！
translation: "Furthermore, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 住菩薩乘諸善男子、善女人等若能書寫甚深般若波羅蜜多種種莊嚴，受持、讀誦，當知是善男子、善女人等於此般若波羅蜜多深生信解。
translation: "If good men and good women who reside in the bodhisattva vehicle can write down the various adornments of the profound prajñāpāramitā, accept them, and recite them, you should know that they are good men and good women who have profound faith and understanding of the prajñāpāramitā.

source_sentence: 若復於此甚深般若波羅蜜多，以諸華香、寶幢、幡蓋、衣服、瓔珞、伎樂、燈明，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎，當知是善男子、善女人等常為如來、應、正等覺佛眼觀見識知護念，由是因緣定當獲得大財、大勝利、大果、大異熟。
translation: If they also make offerings, venerate, respect, and praise this profound prajñāparamitā with flowers, incense, banners, banners, clothing, jewelry, music, and lamps, that good man or woman will always be guarded and preserved by the Tathāgata, Arhat, and Completely Enlightened One who sees and recognizes it through the Buddha's eyes, and as a result, they'll surely attain great wealth, great victory, great fruit, and great ripening.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等以能書寫、受持、讀誦、供養恭敬、尊重讚歎甚深般若波羅蜜多，由此善根乃至獲得不退轉地，於其中間常不離佛，恒聞正法不墮惡趣。
translation: Because these good men and good women can write, memorize, recite, make offerings, venerate, and praise the profound perfection of wisdom, they will have such good roots that they'll attain the stage of nonretrogression, never part from the Buddha, and always hear the right teaching and not fall into bad destinies.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離布施波羅蜜多，常不遠離淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多。
translation: These good men and good women, from these good roots up to unsurpassed correct perfect enlightenment, are never far from the perfection of generosity, and they're never far from the perfection of pure morality, patience, effort, meditation, and wisdom.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離內空，常不遠離外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空。
translation: These good men and good women, from these good roots up to unsurpassed correct perfect enlightenment, are never far from internal emptiness, never far from external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, existent emptiness, impermanent emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness without limit, dispersed emptiness, emptiness without change, emptiness of original nature, emptiness of own-form, emptiness of shared form, emptiness of all things, inaccessible emptiness, emptiness without nature, emptiness of self-nature, emptiness of self-nature, and emptiness of self-nature without nature.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離真如，常不遠離法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界。
translation: These good men and good women, from these good roots up to unsurpassed correct perfect enlightenment, are never far from the true reality, never far from the Dharma realm, Dharma nature, non-falsity, unchanging diversity, equality, freedom from birth, legality, Dharma abiding, reality, the space realm, and the inconceivable realm.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離苦聖諦，常不遠離集、滅、道聖諦。
translation: These good men and good women, from these good roots up to unsurpassed correct enlightenment, are never free of the noble truth of suffering and never free of the noble truths of arising, ceasing, and the path.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離四靜慮，常不遠離四無量、四無色定。
translation: From these good sons and good women, their good roots ... up to unsurpassed correct enlightenment ... will never part from the four meditations, and they will never part from the four immeasurable and four formless concentrations.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離八解脫，常不遠離八勝處、九次第定、十遍處。
translation: These good men and good women, from these good roots up to unsurpassed correct perfect enlightenment, are never far from the eight liberations, and they're never far from the eight abodes of excellence, nine graduated concentrations, and ten universal abodes.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離四念住，常不遠離四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支。
translation: These good men and good women, from these good roots up to unsurpassed correct enlightenment, are never far from the four abodes of mindfulness and are never far from the four correct eliminations, four miraculous abilities, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of virtual enlightenment, and eight noble factors of the path.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離空解脫門，常不遠離無相、無願解脫門。
translation: These good men and good women, from these good roots up to unsurpassed correct perfect enlightenment, are never far from the gate of liberation through emptiness and never far from the gate of liberation through signlessness and wishlessness.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離修五眼，常不遠離修六神通。
translation: These good men and good women, from these good roots up to unsurpassed correct enlightenment, are never far from cultivating the five eyes and never far from cultivating the six supernormal powers.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離修佛十力，常不遠離修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法。
translation: These good men and good women, from these good roots up to unsurpassed correct perfect enlightenment, are never far from cultivating the Buddha's ten powers, and they're never far from cultivating the four fearlessnesses, four unhindered understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and 18 uncommon dharmas of the Buddha.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離修無忘失法，常不遠離修恒住捨性。
translation: These good men and good women, from these good roots up to unsurpassed correct enlightenment, are never far from cultivating the Dharma of no forgetfulness and are never far from cultivating the nature of constant abiding equanimity.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離修一切智，常不遠離修道相智、一切相智。
translation: These good men and good women, from these good roots up to unsurpassed correct enlightenment, are never far from cultivating omniscience, and they're never far from cultivating the knowledge of characteristics and the knowledge of all characteristics.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離修一切陀羅尼門，常不遠離修一切三摩地門。
translation: These good men and good women, from these good roots up to unsurpassed correct perfect enlightenment, are never far from cultivating all dhāraṇī teachings and never far from cultivating all samādhi teachings.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離方便善巧，教諸有情得預流果而自不證；常不遠離方便善巧，教諸有情得一來、不還、阿羅漢果而自不證。
translation: Good men and good women, from these good roots up to unsurpassed correct enlightenment, are never far from skillful means to teach sentient beings to attain the fruit of stream-winner without realizing it for themselves, and they're never far from skillful means to teach sentient beings to attain the fruit of once-returner, nonreturner, or arhat without realizing it for themselves.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離方便善巧，教諸有情得獨覺菩提而自不證。
translation: Good men and good women, from these good roots up to unsurpassed correct perfect enlightenment, are always not detached from skillful means to teach sentient beings to attain the enlightenment of pratyekabuddha without realizing it for themselves.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離遊戲菩薩自在神通，從一佛國至一佛國，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎諸佛世尊及諸菩薩摩訶薩眾。
translation: From this good root up to unsurpassed correct perfect enlightenment, these good sons and good women are never far from the playful, unimpeded powers of the bodhisattvas, going from one Buddha-land to another, making offerings to, honoring, and praising the world-honored buddhas and the bodhisattva-mahāsattva congregation.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離嚴淨佛土、成熟有情。
translation: These good men and good women, from these good roots up to unsurpassed correct perfect enlightenment, are never far from adorned and purified buddha-lands and matured sentient beings.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離自在神通遊諸佛土，勸請諸佛轉妙法輪度無量眾。
translation: From these good sons and good women, who have these good roots up to unsurpassed correct perfect enlightenment, they will never leave their sovereign supernormal powers to travel to the buddha lands and invite the buddhas to turn the wonderful wheel of the Dharma and save measureless multitudes.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等由此善根乃至無上正等菩提，常不遠離一切菩薩摩訶薩行。
translation: From these good sons and good women, their good roots lead to unsurpassed correct enlightenment, and they are never far from all bodhisattva-mahāsattva practices.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 由此因緣，住菩薩乘諸善男子、善女人等於此般若波羅蜜多應勤書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、為他廣說。」
translation: For this reason, good men and good women who abide in the bodhisattva vehicle should diligently write, retain, recite, cultivate, contemplate, and explain this prajñāpāramitā in detail for others."

source_sentence: 爾時，舍利子白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that Śāriputra said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 甚深般若波羅蜜多，佛滅度後何方興盛？」
translation: Where will the profound perfection of wisdom flourish after the Buddha's passing away?"

source_sentence: 佛言：「舍利子！
translation: The Buddha said, "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 甚深般若波羅蜜多，我滅度後至東南方當漸興盛。
translation: "The profound perfection of wisdom will gradually flourish in the southeast after I die out.

source_sentence: 彼方當有住菩薩乘苾芻、苾芻尼、鄔波索迦、鄔波斯迦、國王、大臣、長者、居士，能於如是甚深般若波羅蜜多深生信解，書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說，復以種種上妙華鬘、塗散等香、衣服、瓔珞、寶幢、幡蓋、伎樂、燈明，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎如是般若波羅蜜多。
translation: There will be bodhisattvas, bhikṣuṇīs, upāsaka, upāsikā, kings, ministers, elders, and householders living there who deeply believe in and understand such profound prajñāpāramitā, write it down, memorize it, recite it, cultivate it, contemplate it, expound it, and offer support, honor, respect, and praise such prajñāpāramitā with various kinds of superb flower garlands, scattered incense, clothing, jewelry, banners, flags, music, and lamps.

source_sentence: 彼由如是勝善根故，畢竟不墮諸嶮惡趣，常生天人中受富貴妙樂，由斯勢力增益六種波羅蜜多令速圓滿，因此復能供養恭敬、尊重讚歎諸佛世尊，後隨所應依三乘法漸次修習而趣出離。
translation: Because of such excellent good roots, they'll never fall into the dangerous evil destinies, always be born among gods and humans, enjoy wealth and marvelous happiness, and because of this power, they'll quickly perfect the six perfections, so they'll be able to offer support, honor, respect, and praise the world-honored buddhas, and then gradually cultivate the teachings of the three vehicles as they see fit to escape.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 甚深般若波羅蜜多，我滅度後從東南方轉至南方漸當興盛。
translation: "The profound perfection of wisdom will gradually flourish from the southeast to the south after I die out.

source_sentence: 彼方當有住菩薩乘苾芻、苾芻尼、鄔波索迦、鄔波斯迦、國王、大臣、長者、居士，能於如是甚深般若波羅蜜多深生信解，書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說，復以種種上妙華鬘、塗散等香、衣服、瓔珞、寶幢、幡蓋、伎樂、燈明，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎如是般若波羅蜜多。
translation: There will be bodhisattvas, bhikṣuṇīs, upāsaka, upāsikā, kings, ministers, elders, and householders living there who deeply believe in and understand such profound prajñāpāramitā, write it down, memorize it, recite it, cultivate it, contemplate it, explain it, and make offerings, respect, and praise such prajñāpāramitā with various kinds of superb flower garlands, scattered incense, clothing, jewelry, banners, flags, music, and lamps.

source_sentence: 彼由如是勝善根故，畢竟不墮諸嶮惡趣，常生天人中受富貴妙樂，由斯勢力增益六種波羅蜜多令速圓滿，因此復能供養恭敬、尊重讚歎諸佛世尊，後隨所應依三乘法漸次修習而趣出離。
translation: Because of such excellent good roots, they'll never fall into the dangerous evil destinies, always be born among gods and humans, enjoy wealth and marvelous happiness, and because of this power, they'll quickly perfect the six perfections, so they'll be able to offer support, honor, respect, and praise the world-honored buddhas, and then gradually cultivate the teachings of the three vehicles as they see fit to escape.

translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 甚深般若波羅蜜多，我滅度後復從南方至西南方當漸興盛。
translation: "The profound perfection of wisdom will gradually flourish from the south to the southwest again after I die out.

source_sentence: 彼方當有住菩薩乘苾芻、苾芻尼、鄔波索迦、鄔波斯迦、國王、大臣、長者、居士，能於如是甚深般若波羅蜜多深生信解，書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說，復以種種上妙華鬘、塗散等香、衣服、瓔珞、寶幢、幡蓋、伎樂、燈明，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎如是般若波羅蜜多。
translation: There will be bodhisattvas, bhikṣuṇīs, upāsaka, upāsikā, kings, ministers, elders, and householders living there who deeply believe in and understand such profound prajñāpāramitā, write it down, memorize it, recite it, cultivate it, contemplate it, explain it, and make offerings, respect, and praise such prajñāpāramitā with various kinds of superb flower garlands, scattered incense, clothing, jewelry, banners, flags, music, and lamps.

source_sentence: 彼由如是勝善根故，畢竟不墮諸嶮惡趣，常生天人中受富貴妙樂，由斯勢力增益六種波羅蜜多令速圓滿，因此復能供養恭敬、尊重讚歎諸佛世尊，後隨所應依三乘法漸次修習而趣出離。
translation: Because of such excellent good roots, they'll never fall into the dangerous evil destinies, always be born among gods and humans, enjoy wealth and marvelous happiness, and because of this power, they'll quickly perfect the six perfections, so they'll be able to offer support, honor, respect, and praise the world-honored buddhas, and then gradually cultivate the teachings of the three vehicles as they see fit to escape.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 甚深般若波羅蜜多，我滅度後從西南方至西北方當漸興盛。
translation: "The profound perfection of wisdom will gradually flourish from the southwest to the northwest after I die out.

source_sentence: 彼方當有住菩薩乘苾芻、苾芻尼、鄔波索迦、鄔波斯迦、國王、大臣、長者、居士，能於如是甚深般若波羅蜜多深生信解，書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說，復以種種上妙華鬘、塗散等香、衣服、瓔珞、寶幢、幡蓋、伎樂、燈明，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎如是般若波羅蜜多。
translation: There will be bodhisattvas, bhikṣuṇīs, upāsaka, upāsikā, kings, ministers, elders, and householders living there who deeply believe in and understand such profound prajñāpāramitā, write it down, memorize it, recite it, cultivate it, contemplate it, expound it, and offer support, honor, respect, and praise such prajñāpāramitā with various kinds of superb flower garlands, scattered incense, clothing, jewelry, banners, flags, music, and lamps.

source_sentence: 彼由如是勝善根故，畢竟不墮諸嶮惡趣，常生天人中受富貴妙樂，由斯勢力增益六種波羅蜜多令速圓滿，因此復能供養恭敬、尊重讚歎諸佛世尊，後隨所應依三乘法漸次修習而趣出離。
translation: Because of such excellent good roots, they'll never fall into the dangerous evil destinies, always be born among gods and humans, enjoy wealth and marvelous happiness, and because of this power, they'll quickly perfect the six perfections, so they'll be able to offer support, honor, respect, and praise the world-honored buddhas, and then gradually cultivate the teachings of the three vehicles as they see fit to escape.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

translation: "The profound perfection of wisdom will gradually flourish from the northwest to the north after I die out.

source_sentence: 彼由如是勝善根故，畢竟不墮諸嶮惡趣，常生天人中受富貴妙樂，由斯勢力增益六種波羅蜜多令速圓滿，因此復能供養恭敬、尊重讚歎諸佛世尊，後隨所應依三乘法漸次修習而趣出離。
translation: Because of such excellent good roots, they'll never fall into the dangerous evil destinies, always be born among gods and humans, and enjoy wealth and marvelous happiness.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 甚深般若波羅蜜多，我滅度後復從北方至東北方當漸興盛。
translation: "The profound perfection of wisdom will gradually flourish from the north to the northeast again after I die out.

source_sentence: 彼方當有住菩薩乘苾芻、苾芻尼、鄔波索迦、鄔波斯迦、國王、大臣、長者、居士，能於如是甚深般若波羅蜜多深生信解，書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說，復以種種上妙華鬘、塗散等香、衣服、瓔珞、寶幢、幡蓋、伎樂、燈明，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎如是般若波羅蜜多。
translation: There will be bodhisattvas, bhikṣuṇīs, upāsaka, upāsikā, kings, ministers, elders, and householders living there who deeply believe in and understand such profound prajñāpāramitā, write it down, memorize it, recite it, cultivate it, contemplate it, explain it, and make offerings, respect, and praise such prajñāpāramitā with various kinds of superb flower garlands, scattered incense, clothing, jewelry, banners, flags, music, and lamps.

source_sentence: 彼由如是勝善根故，畢竟不墮諸嶮惡趣，常生天人中受富貴妙樂，由斯勢力增益六種波羅蜜多令速圓滿，因此復能供養恭敬、尊重讚歎諸佛世尊，後隨所應依三乘法漸次修習而趣出離。
translation: Because of such excellent good roots, they'll never fall into the dangerous evil destinies, always be born among gods and humans, enjoy wealth and marvelous happiness, and because of this power, they'll quickly perfect the six perfections, so they'll be able to offer support, honor, respect, and praise the world-honored buddhas, and then gradually cultivate the teachings of the three vehicles as they see fit to escape.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 我滅度已，後時、後分、後五百歲，甚深般若波羅蜜多於東北方大作佛事。
translation: After I die, in the latter part of my life and for the next 500 years, the profound perfection of wisdom will be applied in great buddha-work in the northeast.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 一切如來、應、正等覺所尊重法即是般若波羅蜜多，如是般若波羅蜜多一切如來、應、正等覺共所護念。
translation: "The teaching respected by all tathāgatas, worthies, and right ascendants is prajñā-pāramitā, and thus prajñā-pāramitā is guarded by all tathāgatas, worthies, and right ascendants in common.

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: Venerable Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 非佛所得法、毘奈耶無上正法有滅沒相，諸佛所得法、毘奈耶無上正法即是般若波羅蜜多。
translation: "It's not that the Dharma obtained by the Buddha or the unsurpassed correct Dharma of Vinaya has an aspect of annihilation, but the Dharma obtained by the Buddha or the unsurpassed correct Dharma of Vinaya is prajñāpāramitā.

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: Vairocana!

source_sentence: 彼東北方諸善男子、善女人等，若能於此甚深般若波羅蜜多信解、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說，我常護念是善男子、善女人等令無惱害。
translation: If those good men and good women in the northeast can believe, retain, recite, practice, contemplate, and explain this profound prajñāpāramit, I will always protect and remember those good men and good women so that they won't be harmed.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼東北方諸善男子、善女人等，若能書寫甚深般若波羅蜜多，復以種種上妙華鬘、塗散等香、衣服、瓔珞、寶幢、幡蓋、伎樂、燈明，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎甚深般若波羅蜜多，我定說彼諸善男子、善女人等，由此善根畢竟不墮諸嶮惡趣，生天人中常受妙樂，由斯勢力增益六種波羅蜜多，因此復能供養恭敬、尊重讚歎諸佛世尊，後隨所應依三乘法漸次修習而般涅槃。
translation: "If those good sons and good women in the northeast can write the profound prajñāpāramitā and also make offerings, venerate, respect, and praise the profound prajñāpāramitā with various kinds of superb flower garlands, scattering incense, clothing, jewelry, banners, flags, music, and lamps, I will definitely say that those good sons and good women with these good roots will not fall into the dangerous evil destinies after all, will be born among gods and humans and always experience wonderful happiness, and will be able to increase the six kinds of prajñāramitā by such power, so they can also make offerings, venerate, respect, and praise the buddhas and world-honored ones, and then gradually cultivate and parinirvāṇa according to the appropriate teachings of the three vehicles.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 我以佛眼觀見證知、稱譽讚歎是善男子、善女人等所獲功德，東西南北四維上下無量無數無邊世界一切如來、應、正等覺安隱住持現說法者，亦以佛眼觀見證知、稱譽讚歎是善男子、善女人等所獲功德。」
translation: I have observed, seen, realized, praised, and commended the merits attained by these good sons and good women with the Buddha's eye, and all the tathāgatas, arhats, and correct enlightened ones in the four dimensions east, west, north, south, and up, in the countless, numerous, and infinite worlds who peacefully abide and presently teach the Dharma have also observed, seen, realized, praised, and commended the merits attained by these good sons and good women with the Buddha's eye."

source_sentence: 爾時，舍利子白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that Śāriputra said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 甚深般若波羅蜜多，佛滅度已，後時、後分、後五百歲，於東北方廣流布耶？」
translation: Did the profound perfection of wisdom spread far and wide in the northeast during the latter part of his life and the next 500 years after the Buddha's passing away?"

source_sentence: 佛言：「舍利子！
translation: The Buddha said, "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 如是！
translation: So it is!

source_sentence: 如是！
translation: So it is!

source_sentence: 甚深般若波羅蜜多，我滅度已，後時、後分、後五百歲，於東北方當廣流布。
translation: "After I die, the profound perfection of wisdom will be widely disseminated in the northeast during the latter part of my life and the next 500 years.

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: Vairocana!

source_sentence: 我滅度已，後時、後分、後五百歲，彼東北方諸善男子、善女人等，若得聞此甚深般若波羅蜜多深生信解，書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說，當知彼善男子、善女人等久發無上正等覺心，久修菩薩摩訶薩行，多供養諸佛，多事諸善友，所種善根皆已成熟，由斯福力得聞如是甚深般若波羅蜜多深生信解，復能書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、為他廣說。」
translation: If those good men and good women in the northeast hear this profound prajñāpāramitā and profoundly believe in it, write it, retain it, recite it, cultivate it, contemplate it, and explain it in detail after I've ceased to exist, then you should know that those good men and good women have long arisen the mind of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, have long cultivated the practice of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva, have made many offerings to the buddhas, have served many good friends, and have matured the good roots they've planted; because of this merit, they've heard this profound prajñpāramitā and profoundly believe in it, and they can write it, retain it, recite it, cultivate it, contemplate it, and explain it in detail for others."

source_sentence: 時，舍利子復白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Śāriputra then again said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 佛滅度已，後時、後分、後五百歲，於東北方當有幾許住菩薩乘諸善男子、善女人等，得聞如是甚深般若波羅蜜多深生信解，復能書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、為他廣說？」
translation: After the Buddha's death, at some point in the future, in the latter part of time, or in the next 500 years, will there be a certain number of good men and good women living in the bodhisattva vehicle in the northeast who have heard this profound prajñāpāramitā and have profound faith and understanding, and who can then write it down, memorize it, recite it, practice it, contemplate it, and explain it in detail for others?"

source_sentence: 佛言：「舍利子！
translation: The Buddha said, "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 我滅度已，後時、後分、後五百歲，於東北方雖有無量住菩薩乘諸善男子、善女人等，而少得聞甚深般若波羅蜜多深生信解，其心不驚、不恐、不怖亦無憂悔，復能書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、為他廣說。
translation: After I die, at a later time or time and for the next 500 years, although there are measureless good men and good women of the bodhisattva vehicle living in the northeast who rarely hear the profound prajñāpāramitā and deeply believe in it, their minds aren't frightened, afraid, terrified, or regretful, and they can again write it down, memorize it, recite it, practice it, contemplate it, and explain it in detail for others.

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: Vairocana!

source_sentence: 彼善男子、善女人等聞此般若波羅蜜多，其心不驚、不恐、不怖亦無憂悔，深生信解，書寫、受持、讀誦、修習、思惟、廣說，甚為希有。
translation: When those good men and women hear this perfection of wisdom, their hearts aren't startled, they aren't frightened, they aren't frightened, and they have no regrets; they deeply believe in it, write it down, memorize it, recite it, cultivate it, contemplate it, and explain it in detail, which is rare.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等已曾親近供養恭敬、尊重讚歎無量如來、應、正等覺及諸菩薩摩訶薩眾，請問如是甚深般若波羅蜜多相應義趣。
translation: Those good men and good women who have already approached, supported, respected, venerated, and praised measureless tathāgatas, arhats, and completely enlightened ones and the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas ask about the many ways such profound prajñāparamitcy can be interpreted.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等不久定當圓滿布施波羅蜜多，不久定當圓滿淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多。
translation: These good men and good women will surely complete the perfection of generosity in the near future, and they will surely complete the perfection of pure morality, patience, effort, meditation, and wisdom in the near future.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等不久定當圓滿內空，不久定當圓滿外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空。
translation: Good sons and good women, we will surely fulfill internal emptiness soon, and we will surely fulfill external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, existent emptiness, impermanent emptiness, dispersed emptiness, immutable emptiness, intrinsic emptiness, emptiness in own-nature, emptiness in own-form, emptiness in common form, emptiness of all things, inaccessible emptiness, emptiness without nature, emptiness in self-nature, and emptiness in self-nature without nature.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等不久定當圓滿真如，不久定當圓滿法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界。
translation: Good sons and good women, they will surely complete true reality in the near future, and they will surely complete the Dharma realm, Dharma nature, non-falsity, unchanging and dissimilar nature, equality, freedom from birth, legality, Dharma abiding, reality, the space realm, and the inconceivable realm in the near future.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等不久定當圓滿苦聖諦，不久定當圓滿集、滅、道聖諦。
translation: It won't be long before these good men and good women will surely fulfill the noble truth of suffering, and it won't be long before they'll surely fulfill the noble truths of accumulation, cessation, and the path.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等不久定當圓滿四靜慮，不久定當圓滿四無量、四無色定。
translation: These good men and good women will surely complete the four meditations soon, and they'll surely complete the four immeasurable and four formless concentrations soon.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等不久定當圓滿八解脫，不久定當圓滿八勝處、九次第定、十遍處。
translation: These good men and good women will surely complete the eight liberations in the near future, and they'll surely complete the eight abodes of excellence, the nine graduated concentrations, and the ten universal abodes in the near future.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等不久定當圓滿四念住，不久定當圓滿四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支。
translation: These good men and good women will surely fulfill the four abodes of mindfulness soon, and they will surely fulfill the four correct eliminations, four miraculous abilities, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of virtual enlightenment, and eight factors of the noble path soon.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等不久定當圓滿空解脫門，不久定當圓滿無相、無願解脫門。
translation: These good men and good women will surely complete the liberation gate of emptiness in the near future, and they will surely complete the liberation gate of signlessness and wishlessness in the near future.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等不久定當圓滿菩薩十地。
translation: These good sons and good women will surely complete the bodhisattva's ten stages in the near future.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等不久定當圓滿五眼，不久定當圓滿六神通。
translation: Soon, these good sons and good women will surely perfect the five eyes, and soon they'll surely perfect the six supernormal powers.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等不久定當圓滿佛十力，不久定當圓滿四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法。
translation: These good men and good women will surely fulfill the Buddha's ten powers in the near future, and they will surely fulfill the four fearlessnesses, four unhindered understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and 18 uncommon dharmas of the Buddha in the near future.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等不久定當圓滿無忘失法，不久定當圓滿恒住捨性。
translation: These good men and good women will surely complete the state of no forgetfulness in the near future, and they will surely complete the nature of constantly abiding equanimity in the near future.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等不久定當圓滿一切智，不久定當圓滿道相智、一切相智。
translation: These good men and good women will surely complete omniscience in the near future, and they will surely complete the knowledge of the path and omniscience in the near future.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等不久定當圓滿一切陀羅尼門，不久定當圓滿一切三摩地門。
translation: Soon, these good sons and good women will surely fulfill all the dhāraṇī entries, and soon they'll surely fulfill all the samādhi entries.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等不久定當圓滿一切菩薩摩訶薩行。
translation: Such good sons and good women will surely complete all the bodhisattva-mahāsattva practices in the near future.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等不久定當圓滿阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: Such good sons and good women will surely complete supreme perfect enlightenment in the near future.

source_sentence: 「復次，舍利子！
translation: "Furthermore, Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼善男子、善女人等一切如來所護念故，無量善友所攝受故，殊勝善根所住持故，為欲饒益多眾生故，求趣無上正等菩提。
translation: Because they are guarded by the Tathāgatas, supported by measureless good friends, sustained by excellent good roots, and aiming for unsurpassed correct enlightenment for the sake of benefiting many sentient beings, good men and good women are well aware of them.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 我常為彼諸善男子、善女人等說一切智智相應之法，過去如來、應、正等覺亦常為彼諸善男子、善女人等，說一切智智相應之法。
translation: I've always taught those good men and good women the teaching associated with omniscience, and the Tathāgata, Arhat, and Completely Awakened One have always taught the teaching associated with omniscience for those good men and good women in the past.

source_sentence: 由此因緣，彼善男子、善女人等後生復能求趣無上正等菩提，亦能為他如應說法，令趣無上正等菩提。
translation: As a result, those good men and good women who later attain unsurpassed correct enlightenment will be able to teach others accordingly, leading them to unsurpassed correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼善男子、善女人等身心安定，諸惡魔王及彼眷屬尚不能壞求趣無上正等覺心，何況其餘樂行惡者毀謗般若波羅蜜多，能沮其心不令求趣無上正覺！
translation: When those good sons and good women are stable in body and mind, the evil demon kings and their retinues can't destroy the resolve to pursue the unsurpassed path to perfect enlightenment, so why wouldn't other people who delight in practicing evil behavior and denigrate the perfection of wisdom be able to discourage their minds and prevent them from pursuing the path to perfect enlightenment?

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 如是大乘諸善男子、善女人等聞我說此甚深般若波羅蜜多，心得廣大妙法喜樂，亦能安立無量眾生於勝善法，令趣無上正等菩提。
translation: Thus, when good men and good women of the great vehicle hear me teach this profound perfection of wisdom, they experience a vast joy in the wonderful Dharma and are able to establish measureless sentient beings in the excellent Dharma and lead them to unsurpassed correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等今於我前發弘誓願：『我當安立無量百千俱胝那庾多諸有情類，令發無上正等覺心，修諸菩薩摩訶薩行，示現勸導讚勵慶喜，令於無上正等菩提乃至得受不退轉記。』
translation: Now, good sons and good women, we have made a great vow before me, 'I will establish measureless hundreds of thousands of koṭīnayutas of sentient beings who will arouse the mind of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, cultivate the practices of the bodhisattvas, and show encouragement, praise, and rejoice, so that they will attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment and even receive the irreversible assurance of being reborn.'

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 我於彼願深生隨喜。
translation: I deeply rejoice in that vow.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 我觀如是住菩薩乘諸善男子、善女人等所發弘願心語相應，彼善男子、善女人等於當來世定能安立無量百千俱胝那庾多諸有情類，令發無上正等覺心，修諸菩薩摩訶薩行，示現勸導讚勵慶喜，令於無上正等菩提乃至得受不退轉記。
translation: I observe that when I observe the words of good men and good women who thus abide in the bodhisattva vehicle and who give rise to the great vow, those good men and good women will surely be able to establish measureless hundreds of thousands of koṭīnayus of sentient beings in the future, cause them to give rise to the mind of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, cultivate the practices of the bodhisattvas, and show encouragement, praise, and rejoice, so that they'll attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment and even receive the irreversible assurance of being reborn.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等亦於過去無量佛前發弘誓願：『我當安立無量百千俱胝那庾多諸有情類，令發無上正等覺心，修諸菩薩摩訶薩行，示現勸導讚勵慶喜，令於無上正等菩提乃至得受不退轉記。』
translation: Those good sons and good women also made a great vow before measureless buddhas in the past, 'I will establish measureless hundreds of thousands of koṭīnayutas of sentient beings who will arouse the mind of unsurpassed correct enlightenment, cultivate the practices of bodhisattvas, and show encouragement, praise, and rejoice, so that they will attain unsurpassed correct enlightenment and even receive the irreversible assurance of being reborn.'

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 過去諸佛亦於彼願深生隨喜。
translation: The buddhas of the past also profoundly delighted in that vow.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 過去諸佛亦觀如是住菩薩乘諸善男子、善女人等，所發弘願心語相應，彼善男子、善女人等於當來世定能安立無量百千俱胝那庾多諸有情類，令發無上正等覺心，修諸菩薩摩訶薩行，示現勸導讚勵慶喜，令於無上正等菩提乃至得受不退轉記。
translation: The buddhas of the past also observed that when good men and good women who thus abide in the bodhisattva vehicle match the words of their hearts with their great vow, those good men and good women will surely be able to establish measureless hundreds of thousands of koṭīnayus of sentient beings in the future, cause them to develop the mind of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, cultivate the practices of the bodhisattvas, praise and celebrate them, and cause them to attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment and even receive the irreversible assurance of future attainment.

source_sentence: 「舍利子！
translation: "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 是善男子、善女人等信解廣大，能依妙色、聲、香、味、觸修廣大施，修此施已復能種殖廣大善根，因此善根復能攝受廣大果報，攝受如是廣大果報專為利樂一切有情，於諸有情能捨內外一切所有。
translation: "Good sons and good women have a great deal of faith and understanding, cultivate great generosity based on subtle form, sound, odor, taste, and touch, and after cultivating this generosity, they can plant great good roots, which in turn can produce great rewards, produce such great rewards specifically for the benefit and welfare of all sentient beings, and abandon all internal and external possessions of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 彼迴如是所種善根，願生他方諸佛國土現有如來、應、正等覺宣說如是甚深般若波羅蜜多無上法處，彼聞如是甚深般若波羅蜜多無上法已，復能安立彼佛土中無量百千俱胝那庾多諸有情類，令發無上正等覺心，修諸菩薩摩訶薩行，示現勸導讚勵慶喜，令於無上正等菩提得不退轉。」
translation: Thus planting good roots, he wishes to be born in one of the buddha lands in another direction where the Tathāgata, the Worthy One, and the Perfectly Enlightened One now preach such a profound, unsurpassed doctrine of prajñāpāramitā, and after hearing such a profound, unsurpassed doctrine of prajñāpāramitā, he can then establish measureless hundreds of thousands of koṭīs of sentient beings in that buddha land, cause them to arouse the mind of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, cultivate the practices of the bodhisattvas, and show encouragement, praise, and rejoice, so that they will attain irreversibility in unsurpassed perfect enlightenment."

source_sentence: 時，舍利子復白佛言：「甚奇！
translation: Śāriputra then again said to the Buddha, "How marvelous!

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 希有！
translation: I wish I had!

source_sentence: 善逝！
translation: Well gone!

source_sentence: 佛於過去未來現在諸所有法無不證知，於一切法、真如、法界及法性等無不證知，於諸法教無不證知，於諸有情心行差別無不證知，於過去佛、菩薩、聲聞及佛土等無不證知，於未來佛、菩薩、聲聞及佛土等無不證知，於現在佛、菩薩、聲聞及佛土等無不證知，於十方界一切如來、應、正等覺及所說法菩薩、聲聞、佛土等事無不證知。
translation: The Buddha knows nothing about all dharmas past, future, and present, nothing about all dharmas, true natures, Dharma realms, and Dharma natures, nothing about the teachings of dharmas, nothing about the distinctions in the minds and actions of sentient beings, nothing about the buddhas, bodhisattvas, śrāvakas, and Buddha-lands of the past, nothing about the buddhas, bodhisattvas, śrāvakas, and Buddha-lands of the future, nothing about the buddhas, bodhisattvas, śrāvakas, and Buddha-lands of the present, and nothing about all tathāgatas, arhats, and correct enlightenment in the ten directions and the bodhisattvas, śrāvakas, and Buddha-lands of the teachings.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若菩薩摩訶薩於六波羅蜜多，勇猛精進恒求不息，彼於此六波羅蜜多，為有得時、不得時不？」
translation: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva makes bold and diligent efforts and never stops seeking the six perfections, when does he attain them and when doesn't he attain them?"

source_sentence: 佛言：「舍利子！
translation: The Buddha said, "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼善男子、善女人等恒於此六波羅蜜多，勇猛精進欣求不息，一切時得無不得時。
translation: Those good sons and good women will always pursue these six perfections with vigor and zeal, seeking them without stopping, and they'll attain them at all times and at no time fail to attain them.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼善男子、善女人等恒於此六波羅蜜多，勇猛精進欣求不息，諸佛菩薩常護念故。」
translation: Those good sons and good women are always diligent, diligent, and eager to pursue these six perfections, so the buddhas and bodhisattvas always guard and think about them."

source_sentence: 舍利子言：「世尊！
translation: Śāriputra said, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 彼善男子、善女人等若不得六波羅蜜多相應經時，如何可說彼得此六波羅蜜多？」
translation: If those good men and good women didn't know the six perfections and the many responses to the sūtras, how could they say, 'Peter, these six perfections are numerous?'"

source_sentence: 佛言：「舍利子！
translation: The Buddha said, "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼善男子、善女人等恒於此六波羅蜜多，勇猛信求不顧身命，有時不得此相應經無有是處。
translation: There's no place for good men and good women who are always boldly faithful and pursue these six perfections without concern for their own lives and who sometimes don't get this associated sūtra.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 舍利子！
translation: Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼善男子、善女人等為求無上正等菩提，示現勸導讚勵慶喜諸有情類，令於此六波羅蜜多相應經典受持、讀誦、思惟、修學，由此善根，隨所生處常得此六波羅蜜多相應契經，受持、讀誦、勇猛精進、如教修行，成熟有情、嚴淨佛土，速證無上正等菩提。」
translation: Those good men and good women who seek unsurpassed correct enlightenment and show, guide, praise, and rejoice in sentient beings, cause them to accept, recite, contemplate, and cultivate these six perfections and the associated sūtras, and as a result of these good roots, they will always attain these six perfections and the associated sūtras wherever they arise, accept, recite, vigorously and diligently apply themselves as taught, ripen sentient beings, adorn and purify the Buddha land, and quickly realize unsurpassed correct enlightenment."
